name: Adventure 200
overview: You are the head of palace security. Agents from the evil land of Grunlock, which lies to the East of the great ravine, have stolen some treasures and you are in disgrace. The king has told you that "if you return to the palace without recovering ALL the treasures you will be killed". You are dressed as a peasant and will be able to travel freely in most parts of Grunlock provided you do not arouse suspicion. A torn piece of paper was left behind by the thieves.
